items.summary: Fix the backend image/blob persistence so that photos uploaded via bulk upload and via the admin “Replace Item Image” flow are actually stored in blob storage and remain retrievable later via the stored ExternalBlob reference.

Ensure the storefront only shows items that are published, but make the post-upload experience explicitly communicate why newly uploaded items may not appear on the public storefront and guide the admin to publish them.

Improve frontend diagnostics for missing/broken item images so admins can distinguish between (a) an unpublished item not appearing on the storefront and (b) an item image failing to load due to a broken blob URL.
